mapper.select: SELECT p.PURCHASE_NO, p.MEMBER_ID, pi.QUANTITY, p.TOTAL_AMOUNT, p.TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, p.FINAL_AMOUNT, pr.PRODUCT_NO, pr.PRODUCT_NAME, pr.IMAGE_URL, pr.PRICE, m.NAME AS memberName, m.PHONE AS memberPhone, m.EMAIL AS memberEmail FROM PURCHASE_TBL p JOIN PURCHASE_ITEM_TBL pi ON p.PURCHASE_NO = pi.PURCHASE_NO JOIN PRODUCT_TBL pr ON pi.PRODUCT_NO = pr.PRODUCT_NO JOIN MEMBER_TBL m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE p.PURCHASE_NO = #{purchaseNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PURCHASE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PURCHASE_TBL (PURCHASE_NO, MEMBER_ID, RECIPIENT_MEMBER_ID, PURCHASE_DATE, STATUS, GIFT_YN, PAYMENT_METHOD, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, FINAL_AMOUNT) VALUES (#{purchaseNo}, #{memberId}, #{recipientMemberId}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{status}, #{giftYn}, #{paymentMethod}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalDiscountAmount}, #{finalAmount})

INSERT INTO PURCHASE_ITEM_TBL (PURCHASE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, QUANTITY, PURCHASE_PRICE, PURCHASE_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT) VALUES (#{purchaseNo}, #{productNo}, #{quantity}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseDiscountAmount})
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASE_TBL SET STATUS = #{status}, PAYMENT_METHOD = #{paymentMethod}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount}, TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = #{totalDiscountAmount}, FINAL_AMOUNT = #{finalAmount} WHERE PURCHASE_NO = #{purchaseNo}
